name: Innoquous 4
description: The fourth in the series of gravity-flipping platformer games originally released in May 2011, Innoquous 4 is over four times the size of its predecessor! 75 levels with five distinct game modes (effectively 375 variants, to I1's 10, I2's 18 and I3's 90) adding challenging twists to already challenging levels, not including the added Speedrun mode - complete the entire game as quickly as you can! Also includes stat tracking, options, and help.
